title: SoC RTVF 360-0-21 Topics in Media Writing

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
REQUIRED book is:Good in a Room by Stephanie Palmer

This course will focus on how to sell yourself as a writer and how to talk about your ideas by doing hands on practice sessions, talking to various professionals in the industry, and putting together a strong pitch package that students can use as they transition to the professional world.

subject: RTVF
